body_html:
I'm in favor of merging this. If we can simplify it later, great. I have the following questions:

  • What happens when we add a new dependency?
  • What happens when we update a dependency?
  • Can we remove some of the redundancy? Bazel likes things to be explicit, but having both a file in systemlibs and having to list its name in a whitelist is jarring (to me).
body_text:

Can we remove some of the redundancy? Bazel likes things to be explicit, but having both a file in systemlibs and having to list its name in a whitelist is jarring (to me).
body:
I'm in favor of merging this. If we can simplify it later, great. I have the following questions:

- What happens when we add a new dependency? 
- What happens when we update a dependency?
- Can we remove some of the redundancy? Bazel likes things to be explicit, but having both a file in systemlibs and having to list its name in a whitelist is jarring (to me).
